name: CACP LEIDS
tagline: Canadian Law Enforcement Information Data Standards
body:
We are a group focused on driving interoperable information sharing between Law Enforcement and partners within Canada.  Our mission is the following:

_Enable Common Law Enforcement Information Exchanges, Regardless of system or technology_

Guided by the Canadian Association of Chiefs of Police, LEIDS executes this mission through the following activities:
* Define common data exchange requirements for police agencies and partners
* Either adopt existing data exchanges or create new exchanges.  All LEIDS exchanges are NIEM (National Information Exchange Model) based.
* Manage a set of criteria to ensure “LEIDS Compliance” for agencies or vendors.
* Support adoption of interoperable data exchanges for law enforcement and the justice community as a whole.
